Translations.Text: palaoneun modeun dosilo simbu leum kkundeul-eul bonaemyeo malhagil
uli moduneun juui gipge gamsahago issnola
geuleona hananim-eun geudeul-eul nag wongwa saem-eulobuteo chubanghayeossgo
iseula-el jasondeul-eul geuleohan geosdeul-ui sangsogjalo hayeossdeoni
ssangbang-i seolo boassdeola ittae mose-ui chujongjadeul-i goham-eul jileumyeo uliga paebaehago issseubnida
gyeolko geuleohji anihageoneul na ui junimkkeseoneun nawa gat-i hasieo naleul indohasinila
hananim-i moseege gyesihayeoneoui jigwang-ilo badaleul ttaelila ha ni badaga du gallaelo gallajyeo yangjjogbubun-i geodaehan sancheoleom doeeossdeola
hananim-eun sangdaepyeon-eul jeobgeunha dolog hayeo igsake hago
mosewa geuligo geuleul dongbanhan moduleul guchulhan hu
sillo geu an-eneun yejeung-i issgeoneul geulaedo geudeul daedasuneun midji anihadeola
jinsillo juneom-eun gwonneung-gwa jabi lo chungmanhasim-ila
